Reviews.Title: very good pc
Reviews.Author: Alhasan M. Al Jwad
Reviews.Content: I found this pc very very good it can helpe at work its save timeI use it at home at work and at any place i go

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: VINCENT
Reviews.Content: It's exactly what I was looking for. No IOS nor Android just Windows 7 Professional, awesome!!! Very fast Bios, very good performance.

Reviews.Title: What was i doing with an IPad?
Reviews.Author: AJ Garcia
Reviews.Content: This table is by far the best device available. It makes the rest to look like toys. It is a PC 100% and on the move, it turns on as fast as any other. I take it everyday of the week and twice in a Sunday.
